entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
